## AcceptedConflict type

Accepted Conflict

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AcceptedConflict = {
    target: DocMetadata;
    strategy: 'ours' | 'theirs';
    operation: WriteOperation;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [DocMetadata](./git-documentdb.docmetadata.md)<!-- -->, [WriteOperation](./git-documentdb.writeoperation.md)

## Remarks

- target: conflicted target

- strategy: applied strategy

- operation: applied operation on an applied strategy side (ours or theirs)

- file\_sha: SHA-1 hash of applied document
